values: Ive came to a conclusion in my life. I cannot slack all of my life. If I do that I will live in poverty and never succeed. Never meet my maximum potential. So Ive set some goals for myself. Ive decided im going to college for business and computer repair. Im going to hopefully start my own company later on down the road. Thats what America was based on. Dreams.

I havent updated this in a long time. Me and Candace are doing fine. Im going to try my best to see her today. Ive been really bored and worried with school, im really on the verge of dropping out and just getting my ged. I might just drop out and go to recovery. But I dunno. I need to go take my cisco test.

Recollection. I havent updated in this thing in ages. Life's sorta come, passed, backed over the neighbors cat. Then it sped off down the street. Ive been sore for awile. 4th block is killing me. But I say with this pain and soreness, the results will be well worth it. I REALLY want a job. Thats sad isnt it. I wish those words didnt have to come out of my mouth. Im going crazy over it though. Because funds are low. I need a new car and I need to start saving for my books and stuff in college. So yea its really crazy. Im really happy being with Candace, she is so understanding. She is letting me off the leash to go to Grubb's and get drunk sociably :D. Candace your the best. I LOVE  you soo MUCH!!!

- J a y -

Sunday was really good. I woke up at Candaces, went home, then went back to Candaces, then went to church. Today although has been the suck. School was a drag, especially since we still gotta do mid-trems. I need a topic for my senior project. I need to pass Cisco. I have so many needs. Candace said that she let me win at throwing paper airplanes, which in fact she didnt :P. Yea im good I know it lol. Well im going to go. 

- J a y -

Last night wasthe start of a new year. Yea may this one bring great prosperity lol. Last night I spent the night with Candace. :D I love that girl, I swear to it. We went to church then came back to her house to watch the ball drop. On our way through the tunnel, A mpd pig and three state boys passed us then turned off. And I was like "There going to have a roadblock on the way back through..." Well yea thats just what happend to. So I got stuck at Candaces (Not really stuck, I just didnt want to go anywhere :P). We stayed up til 6 and just laid together. It was cute, I wish to wake up EVERYMORNING with her. Well IM going back to her house today at 4:30 and then im going to church with her. But as of now I have to go.

Wow...

Well today I went to work til 5. Then I ventured off job hunting. The unemployment office was closed :(. But im getting up early tomorrow morning and going. Because thats the best place to get a job is... Well sorta. It takes alot of out of everything. 

Im so incrediby in love. I missed Candace like mad crazy today. I havent gotten to talk to her. My phone line is messed up or something. When we pick up the phone no-one can hear us. But I got a maor plan for mum n' dad. Just buy a new phone. Solves the problem entirely. I got mail today, I should have made a huge deal out of this, but I got accepted to ITT Tech. What a major accomplishment for me. I shall be venturing to K-town everyday. Work like a dog, so I can attend. Its not the enrollment that will kill me. It will be the gas and time. Maybe I should just move to knoxville. Who knows. But Ive got to go amd awit for Candace to get on.

I hate that chirstmas has passed. Ive really had a good one. It wasnt the present or the food. It was just the fact that I got to spend sooo much time with Candace. Gosh she is everything ANYONE would ever want, and im lucky enough to have her... even if for alittle while. Which I want to spend forever with her. We danced & watched movies. But most of all I just loved holding her in arms, her sweet scent surronding me and just peting and talking to her. Time seemed to stop a little, for we were lost in its moments. I get to see her today too :D. Were going to the mall w/ Justin & Arianna. Yea its been great. But Ive got to go. CJL is LOVE!!! & ICE IS LOVE TOO!!! LOL [inside joke ;)]

Well this holiday has been magnificent. Ive got to spend the holidays with Candace <3 and I got some really cool gadgets. I seen my baby last night, im seeing her again tonight and im seeing her tomorrow. What more could one ask for? Nothing really. Yea she is my everything. Last night we just layed around and cuddled with one another. It was one of those sweet moments. God no one can make me feel like she does. Mark my words, read them in red, im gonna marry that girl someday :D.

Wow it's been along time since I've updated. Alots changed and went on. Yea so I guess this is where I clue everyone in on whats been happening in the life of I. Candace and I are back together, We've worked out all of our flaws and problems. Everything has been set aside besides that. I've been working for my grandfather at the mines. Its a dirty job but it pays really good. The past few days I've only worked and been with Candace. Last night I went over to her house and we exchanged presents. I dont think she liked mine to well. I got her a promise ring, some yellow roses and a necklace. Oh well you can't win them all!!! I think tonight I shall join Luke and go to the mall. I might go to Grubbs Pre-Chirstmas Party and chill. I might have a drink or two but none else. Cuz yea I don't do that stuff anymore. Kinda makes me sad when I think of all the money I've wasted on it... Lol we learn from our mistakes. Peace.
- Jay -

I got a new cell phone finally. I got crossing the frame as my ring tone. I never thought I would get a new one. So no one, please if you want to yack, call my cell, thats why I have it :P.

Last night was alright. I could have went to snowball, but I went to Grubbs. I didnt wanna see certain ppl that would have attended snowball... Grubbs was pretty kool. I didnt drink or smoke any so I was sober and got to watch everyone make asses out of themselves. I stayed around there til about 3 a.m. Travis was really drunk. He had some Yager... that shit is nasty. It tastes just like black liqourice or how ever you want to pronounce and spell it. I have a void in my life. Alittle empty spot and I dont know how to fill it. Hopefully I will soon though. Well im gonna go clean before my parents go mad and start bitching. I got $200 dollars from my uncle for xmas so im prolly gonna go to ktown some time soon. Hit up Hollister and all the other stores, just cuz im kool like that. Be good guys.

- Jay -

Last night was about the death of me. I think I came a hair of getting alcohol posioning and dying. That would have made a few people happy like CJL, but I cant let that get to me. I started crying to Bruce about her, im not normally emotional when I drink, but I had been thinking about it alot yesterday so I guess thats why. I still feel like shit, im defanitely not drinking tonight... If I did it wouldnt be good, especially me feeling like this. Things were ok at the game. I seen Kati and talked to her for a good while, then I left. Most of last night at the party is a blur and it hurts when I try to think about it. Damn alcohol, I hate it with a passion. No, wait I cant say that. I love the feeling it gives you but I hate the results that come after. Well ive still got my hangover so im gonna go lay down and try to go back to sleep so my body can regenerate all it lost last night. 

- Jay -

The five things on my mind?

1) Cant wait to see Kati tonight
2) Do I smell good
3) Where is Luke & Bruce
4) Dude Where's My Car? <I keed. I keed.>
5) Wheres the party... <actually the party is @ Grubb's tonight lol>

Yea im gonna spend my weekend like I usually do. So smashed that it hurts to think. Oooh Sheena is bringing Jenna to Grubb's. I havent seen her since like 7th Grade. I was in her class lol. Good times, good times. Everything is on track now and life is moving at a slow but steady pace. I can really honestly truthfully to God say that im enjoying it. Sty Fly or Stay High...

- Jay -

Today has been great. I had some starbucks coffee this morning. That shits the bomb!!! Today at school was just awesome. Mr Lefevers let us watch a movie and Mrs. Cox was absent. So we sorta did what we wanted in her class. I feel really bad for turning this freshman down... Well I would have turned her down, Its Dunn's girlfriend. She's really pretty and has beautiful eyes but she is Dunn's women and I wont take any friends chic, cuz thats just wrong and another reason is because im like 4 years older than her lol. Luke or Bruce hasnt talked to me today. It makes me wonder what their into. Kati got on today she's sick, but im suppose to call her at nine after she gets back from Ryans. She asked me to come and I should have went. I dont see why I didnt. Well lifes flowing pretty easily now so im gonna go kick back and play some video-games. Stay Fly or Stay High.

- Jay -

The world is so hung up on ethics that its not fucking funny. I say this because this morning I was smoking a ciggerette and drinking my coffee and it came on cnn that people were rallying over a recent face transplant a women had. Well wtf... Is it ethical to kill muslims.... Well anyway it got me pretty heated because people do much worse. Were the only things on earth that have ever destroyed something on it, really think about it. Monkeys are smart, but you dont see them blowing shit up. Elephants are smarter than us, but still you dont see them hijacking planes and crashing them into near lanmarks, America is fucked get over it. Soon everything will turn into an anarchy. Goverment = Shit. All forms of government are corrupt. But yet again its not the workings of elephants and monkeys. No its because of us ourselves... Humanbeings....

Today I seen my grandmother. She is doing fine, I thank everyone for their prayers. Today Bruce and I are going to record @ R.U.S.E. We might make the label. Something More is born today, two musicians dreams come true today. Yes today is the day. Were gonna be awesome, although we havent decided which genre to take on. Byr truthfully I want to do alittle bit of everything. Well im gonna bounce, Ive got to get my equipment ready and print out some of our tabs. We will keep you posted...
- Jay -

Im losing the last person I truly care about :'(. My grandmaw is really bad off and had to be flown to Ut... I feel so bad, nothing good EVER happends to me. Wtf did I do to deserve all of this. If she doesnt pull out of this im going to kill myself...

I dont know what she wants from me... It kills me. She said she loved me. But whats it matter if im not their for her. Its all in vain if there's nothing to gain. These white pills marked Watson help me cope. The bud helps me think. The alcohol numbs me and brings temporary relief. But what I really need it gone...

2.) Who was the last person you kissed? Cant remember
3.) Cars or Trucks? Cars they have more room
4.) What was the last thing you ate? Cherry Cordal
5.) Your Favorite movie? It's A Wonderful life, I watch it every Chirstmas
6.) What band are you listening to now? Underoath <3
7.) Are you a virgin..? No comment... :|

9.) Tits or ass? Both :D
10.) Beer or Liqour? Yet again both :D

The light glares from the alarm clock. The menacing outlines make out 6:50 a.m. I arise out of bed. Sleep trys to overwhelm me. But I fight it off with each step towards the restroom. The light in the hallway glares off the tiling off the floor. As if its laughing, just knowing whats going to happen today. That should have gaven it all away. I do my business and return to my chambers. I begin to dress. One leg at a time. A undershirt followed by a poloshirt to be concealed by a hoodie. I glance at the window, its covered in its last length of frost. 

Fifteen minutes later I arrive downstairs. Light my cigerette off the stove and preceed my way to the bus stop. I linger at the stop. The cold bites my body. Wrapping it in that sense of loathing. On the brink of ice. My feet cheel. My heart throbs. The cold overwhelms me. I take another draw off of my cigerette and begin to stomp the ashes. The cherrys falls, and crumbles. The fire fades off leaving nothing but greyish remains. Like a skeleton revealing its secrets of a past life. Almost muttering to itself "Why. why did things end like this. Did I not live. Did I deserve this."

I take it all in. When Suddenly it seems the clouds part and all weight is off my shoulders. The complete and secure feeling of perfect nirvana. Like a warm sunny day with friends at a lake. One of those moments were your just hanging your feet off a side of the boat and letting the sun warm you. Yes I was bathing in my own sun. The center of the nirvana I had created for myself. The one place where happiness always could be found. In the subconcious of my mind. Just that one moment of living.

Then there was no light. I had blinked myself into a white paradox. No walls, no creases just plain lineless white as far as the eyes could see. "Where am I" I Thought to myself. There was an old man with specticals. Sitting in a wicker chair. He looked as though he had been waiting on me. He rolled up his white sleeve and looked down at his watch and nodded. He proceeded towards me with a book. A grey book with the letter T on it. The book was massive and I was amazed that such an elderly man could carry such an object.

"James, is it" muttered the man looking from behind his specticals.  "Yes" I replied shocked that he knew my name. "James, do you know why you are here. You are here because you have failed". What the fuck I thought. What did I fail at. It gave me that feeling you get when you know you flunked a chemistry test and you just know your going to catch hell from it. "I do as I pleased. I did no wrong." was my answer. But I should have known there was no right answer for this quiz. "You have been sentenced to an eternal limbo. You will live forever in the day of your funeral. Each day you wake you will wonder into your own funeral. This is your punishment."

God only knows when your word isnt pure. I seen my coffin. Laying there surronded by my friends, relatives and all of those who knew of me. I looked so pale. My hair parted to the side. My eyes closed and a look of solitude fixed on my face. I still wake up everyday to that last day. I fade to my funeral. This is my life. This is what I made of it.

Pineapples grow in fields called "Groves". Not on tree's for a pineapple is to heavy to be supported by a limb. Just thought you guys should know.
- Jay -

There is no real me,
Only an entity something of mislery.
And though I can hide my cold gaze and you can shake my hand and feel flesh gripping yours, and maybe you can even sense that our lifestyles are probally comperable
I simply am not there.

Many great man have fell victim to the power that love brings. Love is the tool to end and start all wars. It truly is the greatest gift given to man. To show emotion, just to care about somone can lead to that feeling of nirvana. I love Candace more than anything and each day I realize how much more I love her. But it just seems she doesnt feel the same about me. She can look me dead in the eyes and tells me she loves me, but I dont feel her words. Its one thing to say you love someone and then a completely different thing to actually love them. Im so lost and I feel theres nothing I can do because really their isnt. The Only thing I can do is hope that she feels the same and will talk to her mother. But I think im not the only one in her life. I dunno when I start to think about it, it makes me weak. Why did I have to let her go 3 months ago :(

                                                                                 - Jay -

8 months - By Jay

I cant forget what she said.
The moment when she agreed to climb out of my head.
And since then Ive been born to bleed.
I wish I never gave her a reason to leave.

Eight months is a long time.
Three months has made me loose my mind.
And all that time I wished you were here.
Eight months is almost a year.

The nights full of fights and pouring tears.
It lets me know that im a fool for ever loosing you.
Lets make this better or atleast try.
Im tired if waiting here and wondering why.

Because eight months is a long time.
The three months apart made me loose my mind.
And all that time I wished you were here.
Because eight months is almost a year.

I woke up with tears straining down my face.
Never knowing if I have what it takes to finish this race.
I guess eight months isnt so long.
Especially when your gone.
I dont think that you are coming home.

Because eight months is a long time.
The three months apart made me loose my mind.
And all that time I wished you were here.
Because eight months is almost a year.

Eight months is a long time.
Three months made has made me loose my mind.
And all those time I wished you were here.
Eight months is close to a year.

I stayed up last night writing this song. Im really depressed and confused about alot. Candace says she loves me and that she wants to be with me. I wrote her a letter last night and gave it to Josh to give to her. I hope it shows her that I truly care about her. Well anyways heres my song.

Dead December.

A dead December and those reasons to believe.
Maybe this year will be better than the last.
I can't remember the last thing that you said as you were leaving.
Now the days go by so fast.

And it's one more day in this mess.
And it's one more night drenched in lonliness.
If you think that I could be forgiven.
I wish you would.

The smell of hospitals in winter.
And the feeling that it's all a lot of oysters but no pearls.
All at once you look across a crowded room.
To see the way that light attaches to a girl.

And it's one more day up in this mess.
And it's one more night in lonliness.
If you think to come back.
I wish you would.

I woke up without you sometime after two am.
I wanted to talk a little while about the year.
I guess the winter makes you laugh a littler slower.
Makes you talk a little lower.
About the things I could not show her.

And it's going to be a dead December.
And there's reason to believe maybe this time will be better than the last.
I can't remember the last time I tried to tell myself to hold on.
To these moments as they pass.

And it's one more day up in this mess.
And it's one more night in lonliness.
It's been so long since I've seen you.
I guess I should.
